content:
In "Shape of You" by Ed Sheeran, the rhyme pairs in each verse and chorus are as follows:

Verse 1:

* lover/go
* shots/talk slow
* me/conversation
* chance now/dance

Chorus:

* love/me
* lead/crazy
* much/touch
* me/lead

Verse 2:

* you/do
* too/new
* new/you
* body/new

In addition to these rhyme pairs, the song also uses repetition of the phrase "I'm in love with your body" as a refrain throughout the verse and chorus, which helps to add a sense of structure and unity to the song.
